Detailed Description

UART streaming mode Hardware abstraction.

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"

Functions

am_hal_uart_stream_status_t am_hal_uart_interrupt_stream_service (void *pUartHandle)
 Manage UART ISR used when using uart streaming api This is a nonblocking, non-signaling (streaming) uart driver, it saves incoming rx data in the rx queue, and transmits tx data from the queue via fifo with interrupts or DMA.
 
am_hal_uart_errors_t am_hal_stream_uart_append_tx (void *pUartHandle, uint8_t *pui8Buff, uint32_t ui32NumBytes)
 Choose the correct function based on DMA mode for tx append.

 Append data into the uart tx output queue using Tx FIFO not DMA.
